thoughts.text: I want to read an article on the website about productivity and take notes on interesting topics to share with the user.
thoughts.reasoning: Reading articles on productivity is a good way to learn new ways to be productive and share those tips with the user.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'browse_website' command to find an article on productivity
- Read the article and take notes on interesting topics to share with the user
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to spend too much time browsing the web and focus on finding productive and educational articles.

args.question: What are some interesting tips on productivity on this website?
